name: Bar Fight - [DEMO] Romantic Visual Novel
description:
You enter a bar in a new town your visiting, and notice that there is a big fight happening. Trying to stop the guy that is causing trouble, it ends up just being one guy defending a girl from being sexualy assaulted. Three guys where in the side of this girl, and you tend to drive your attention into them and start a conversation.

They offer you to stay at an apartment where the apartment's company is runned my the dad of one of the characters, leaving you free of rent for a week with the condition of helping on of the three guys in their works, so you can gain money to pay your rent.

The three of this guys are : Luke Smith, Maxford Evergarden and Biel Jenneth. 

Luke is an 28 year old man that works as a coach to younger kids and gives them swimming classes. As for him, he is a swimming and an athletics player since he has seven years.

He is really extroverted and nice, always available if it means to help a friend or a close person. He gets really friendly and lovable when he becomes close to someone.

“Call me Max. Maxford is a weird old man’s name. I hate it.” Just like he said, call him Max. Max is 26 years old and works part-time at a coffe shop. Meanwhile, he helps his dad that owns a apartment’s company,making both of them really loaded.

Max may appear scary and intimidating, almost cursing everything that comesstraight into him and getting bad about little things. But getting to know a “special someone” it shows that he can be more than an angry and annoying man.

Biel’s a 25‘s years old guy that has a big passion for plants since he was a kid. He has always dreamed on having his own greenhouse with his sister. Along the years, that dream came true, buying their own greenhouse and starting a lovely little market of crops and flowers.

He is vary caring and soft, always taking care of people and asking questions to check on them. He tends to smile a lot and laugh a lot, as so that he enjoys the “light academy” aesthetic a lot. He is really close to Luke since they known each other for more than a decade.

-------------------------------------------------------------

I hope that you enjoy the DEMO of the first chapter, if you have any opinions please leave them in the comments or if something is not working right. 

There will be in complete seven days of each route, and two endings for each character. You get to know them and spend the days with them till you noticed that you feel something for them.
